Package ohos.usb

Class USBDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.usb.USBDevice

  • public class USBDevice
extends Object
    Get configuration information of a USB device. For details on the information structure, see USB protocol specifications.

    When using this class, a USB device is attached to a USB host. According to the USB protocol specifications, a device contains one or more configurations, a configuration contains one or more interfaces, and an interface contains one or more endpoints.

    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Usb#USB_MANAGER

    • Constructor Detail

      • USBDevice

        public USBDevice​(String deviceName,
                 int vendorId,
                 int productId,
                 int classId,
                 int subClassId,
                 int protocolId,
                 String manufacturerName,
                 String productName,
                 String version,
                 String serialNumber)
        A constructor used to create a USBDevice.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - Indicates the name of the USB device, which is usually determined by the low layer.
        vendorId - Indicates the vendor ID of the USB device, which is assigned by the USB-IF.
        productId - Indicates the product ID of the USB device, which is assigned by the USB-IF.
        classId - Indicates the class code of the USB device, which is assigned by the USB-IF.
        subClassId - Indicates the subclass code of the USB device, which is assigned by the USB-IF.
        protocolId - Indicates the protocol code of the USB device, which is assigned by the USB-IF.
        manufacturerName - Indicates the manufacturer name of the USB device.
        productName - Indicates the product name of the USB device.
        version - Indicates the version number of the USB device.
        serialNumber - Indicates the serial number of the USB device.
        Since:
        5
